Articles.Content:
I am addicted to achievements/trophies/loneliness score so I am creating a new Sandbox game and setting these benchmarks. As I gain these Kerchievements, I will add their value to my sig. Feel free to do the same (you could lie, but what would be the point?). Also, add new Achievements if you'd like. Just give the Kerchievement a clever-ish title, assign a value, and then a description. The only limitation is that these must be done without cheating and that they must be reasonably achieveable. I will add to these as well.

[They ARE Ants!] {5} Achieve a stable orbit around Kerbin.

[Wisconsin, It Ain't] {10} Plant a flag on the Mun.

[Min-Maxin'] {10} Plant a flag on Minmus.

[WALL-E] {5} Perform an EVA that takes you at least 20 meters away from your ship.

[Open Your Mind] {15} Plant a flag on Duna

[Moho Jojo] {20} Plant a flag on Moho

[New Eden Awaits] {20} Plant a flag on Eve

[I Thought They Smelled Bad On The Outside] {25} Plant a flag on Eeloo

[Awaiting Dawn] {20} Plant a flag on Dres

Here are mine so far... seems a bit smaller for my list but I am getting there. Not sure I would count my test save in this though as I have a Duna landing and a mass Mun and Minmus landings.

[They ARE Ants!] {5} Achieve a stable orbit around Kerbin.

[Wisconsin, It Ain't] {10} Plant a flag on the Mun.

[Play it again Sam] {5} Returning to Mun at less than 100km from the first landing without mods.

[Min-Maxin'] {10} Plant a flag on Minmus.

[WALL-E] {5} Perform an EVA that takes you at least 20 meters away from your ship.
This already exists for signatures, just get the ribbons like I have in my signature.
Aww. I prefer things with clever titles (I'm an editor by trade), but I do appreciate the work and visuals of the ribbons.

[i can see the horizon] {15} Achieve sub-orbital trajectory through Jool.

[These are the voyages...] {20} leave Kerbol SOI.

EDIT:more..

[Gemini] {15(docking is pretty hard)} Dock 2 Identical Craft in orbit.

Edited December 13, 2013 by Spartwo

[The Mardi-Gras Story] {25} While in orbit around Kerbin, EVA to and board a ship that is more than 20 km distant.

[Never Tell Me the Odds]{15} Plant a flag on Gilly

[Houston, We've Had a Problem]{10} Get a vessel from Kerbin parking orbit to Mun SOI and return to Kerbin's surface with only 2 burns.
[Should I poke it?] {15} Plant a flag next to the dead Space Kraken.

[Sea, Sun, and Friggin' Cold] {15} Land on Laythe.

[And I Ran...] {25} Land a base on Eeloo.

[You Big Green Ball Of...] {15} Achieve Low Jool Orbit (under 250 km altitude).

You could post a list of achievements from the pre-existing Achievement mod:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/achievements/

100 km? I do that by accident! I think a better goal might be 10 km, or maybe even less. After all, being accurate to within 27 degrees is nothing special, that is like aiming for something 10 feet away, and being 4 feet off-target... with a guided missile.

Edited December 13, 2013 by Pds314

Actually made some for my get out and push challenge not to long ago. here are some edited versions,

Achievements!/points

PLANETS

That was easy-get yourself in to space/ 10

A little higher- orbit of 200, 000 or more/10

"ITs well... grey.... and bumpy."- get to the muns soi/20

If only I had something to say- land on the mun

Minmulist- get to minmus soi/ 20

Looks like candy!-land on minmus.

"gentleman take a walk"- EVA land on minmus / 40

donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t need no fancy equipment. - reach duna SOI an dorbit/40

purple is the new black! - reach eve SOI and orbit/40

H2OOOOOOO?- land in an eve ocean/50

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s getting hot in here! - perform an aero brake/reentry /10

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s biggy!-reach jool SOI and orbit/50

my favorite color! - fly through jools atmosphere/100

How in the name of physics?-land on jool

A sister she is-reach lathye orbit

we can breathe here?-land on lethye/150

DAT sun!- land on moho

ANOMALY'S

kerbin

WE actually used this?!-find the MK1 grave

Who put this here?- find the island airport

Kermunists?- find KSC2

Koswell!?- find the UFO on kerbin

The ancients knew - find the pyramids

mun

I wonder if I could fly through this,- find a mun arch.

Neil-who?- find the Neil Armstrong memorial

Journey to the center of the mun!-find a mun hole

not of this kuniverse- find the mun UFO

All im willing to type up right now.
